document.full_text: protein makes up about 17 percent of the total energy intake for mountain gorillas in uganda. that's close to the 15 percent protein intake the american heart association recommends for people.
document.title: observatory: protein-rich diet helps gorillas keep lean
lines_and_colors: protein makes up about 17 percent of the total energy intake for mountain gorillas in uganda. that's close to the 15 percent protein intake the american heart association recommends for people.
